TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventDescriptor extends System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class EventDescriptor Inherits MemberDescriptor
public ref class EventDescriptor abstract : System::ComponentModel::MemberDescriptor

span.span: Provides information about an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含名稱、 其屬性、 事件繫結至的元件、 事件委派、 委派、 類型以及是否為多點傳送委派。An consists of a name, its attributes, the component that the event is bound to, the event delegate, the type of delegate, and whether the delegate is multicast. 提供下列`abstract`屬性和方法： provides the following `abstract` properties and methods: - 包含的類型上宣告此事件的元件。 contains the type of the component this event is declared on. - 包含事件的委派類型。 contains the type of delegate for the event. - 包含值，指出事件委派多點傳送的委派。 contains a value indicating whether the event delegate is a multicast delegate. - 將事件繫結至的元件。 binds the event to a component. - 解除繫結委派與元件，以便委派不再接收事件，從元件。 unbinds the delegate from the component so that the delegate no longer receives events from the component. 如需有關事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需反映的詳細資訊，請參閱中的主題[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會根據此範例中類別。The following code example is built upon the example in the class. 在文字方塊中的按鈕上列印的每個事件的資訊 （類別、 描述和顯示名稱）。It prints the information (category, description, and display name) of each event on a button in a text box. 它需要`button1`和`textbox1`具現化表單上。It requires that `button1` and `textbox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[EventDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EventDescriptor/CPP/eventdescriptor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EventDescriptor/CS/eventdescriptor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventDescriptor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EventDescriptor/VB/eventdescriptor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddEventHandler (object component, Delegate value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddEventHandler(object component, class System.Delegate value) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub AddEventHandler (component As Object, value As Delegate)
public: abstract void AddEventHandler(System::Object ^ component, Delegate ^ value);
abstract member AddEventHandler : obj * Delegate -> unit

param.name: component
param.span: 元件，將事件提供給委派。

span.span: A component that provides events to the delegate.

param.name: value
param.span: 委派，表示處理事件的方法。

span.span: A delegate that represents the method that handles the event.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將事件繫結至元件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds the event to the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，這個方法是透過反映來實作。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 如需反映的詳細資訊，請參閱中的主題[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information about reflection, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 如需有關委派的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 當您覆寫這個方法時，它應該將委派加入至元件的事件清單叫用適當add_myHandler方法。

span.span: When you override this method, it should add the delegate to the component's event list by invoking the appropriate add_myHandler method.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指示事件委派是否為多點傳送委派的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the event delegate is a multicast delegate.

value.span: 如果事件委派是多點傳送，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event delegate is multicast; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，這個屬性是透過反映來實作。Typically, this property is implemented through reflection. 多點傳送的委派不同於一般委派，因為它可以包含多個只是一種方法的參考。A multicast delegate differs from a regular delegate in that it can contain references to more than just one method. 叫用委派時，以其出現的順序，會以同步方式執行中的多點傳送委派的方法。Methods in a multicast delegate are executed synchronously when the delegate is invoked, in the order in which they appear. 如果其中一個被呼叫的方法會引發例外狀況，然後委派會停止並例外狀況會傳播到委派呼叫端。If one of the called methods raises an exception, then the delegate ceases and the exception is propagated to the delegate caller.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void RemoveEventHandler (object component, Delegate value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveEventHandler(object component, class System.Delegate value) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub RemoveEventHandler (component As Object, value As Delegate)
public: abstract void RemoveEventHandler(System::Object ^ component, Delegate ^ value);
abstract member RemoveEventHandler : obj * Delegate -> unit

span.span: The component that the delegate is bound to.

param.name: value
param.span: 要與元件解除繫結的委派。

span.span: The delegate to unbind from the component.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將委派與元件解除繫結，以便委派不再接收來自元件的事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, unbinds the delegate from the component so that the delegate will no longer receive events from the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，這個方法是透過反映來實作。Typically, this method is implemented through reflection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的主題[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 如需有關委派的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 當您覆寫這個方法時，它應該委派從清單中移除元件的事件叫用適當remove_myHandler方法。

span.span: When you override this method, it should remove the delegate from the component's event list by invoking the appropriate remove_myHandler method.
